patthana22.16:1.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā akusalo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.16:2.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.16:2.1_1: Naabyākataṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.16:2.1_2: Nakusalaṁ naaraṇañca naabyākataṁ naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
